author: gregor
msg: Made sure cocoon.xconf is only copied if it has changed. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=33847

author: bayard
msg: fixed the build (somewhat, still need to edit buld.properties.sample), added the new ideas from Frank Zammetti (Bugzilla: #33676) and fixed the existing code so it actually compiles.

author: bnicholes
msg: Keep track of the number of attributes retrieved from LDAP so that all the values can be properly cached even if the value is NULL.  [PR 33901]

msg: refactored test to use clear instad of reset... tests for xmlrpc daemon support
